mapper.insert: INSERT INTO reservations (order_no, slot_no, user_no, content, status, created_at, updated_at) VALUES (#{orderNo}, #{slotNo}, #{userNo}, #{content}, 'REQUESTED', NOW(), NOW())
mapper.select: SELECT r.no, r.order_no AS orderNo, o.order_code AS orderCode, r.user_no AS userNo, u.name AS userName, r.slot_no AS slotNo, w.slot_date AS slotDate, w.slot_time AS slotTime, r.status AS status, w.amount AS amount FROM reservations r JOIN client u ON r.user_no = u.no JOIN weekly_time_slots w ON r.slot_no = w.no JOIN orders o ON r.order_no = o.no WHERE r.user_no = #{userNo} ORDER BY r.no DESC, w.slot_date DESC, w.slot_time DESC

SELECT r.no, r.order_no AS orderNo, o.order_code AS orderCode, r.user_no AS userNo, u.name AS userName, r.slot_no AS slotNo, w.slot_date AS slotDate, w.slot_time AS slotTime, r.status AS status, r.content AS content, w.amount AS amount FROM reservations r JOIN client u ON r.user_no = u.no JOIN weekly_time_slots w ON r.slot_no = w.no JOIN orders o ON r.order_no = o.no WHERE w.user_no = #{lawyerNo} ORDER BY w.slot_date DESC

SELECT r.no, r.order_no AS orderNo, o.order_code AS orderCode, r.user_no, c.name AS userName, r.slot_no, ts.slot_date, ts.slot_time, r.status, r.content, ts.amount, l.no AS lawyer_no, l.name AS lawyer_name FROM reservations r JOIN weekly_time_slots ts ON r.slot_no = ts.no JOIN orders o ON r.order_no = o.no JOIN user u ON r.user_no = u.no JOIN client c ON u.no = c.no JOIN lawyer l ON ts.user_no = l.no WHERE r.no = #{reservationNo}
